price: 76. We wronged them not, but they were the Zâlimûn (polytheists, wrong-doers).
arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū humu al-ẓālimīna
